<file>
00001| import './globals.css';
00002| import type { Metadata } from 'next';
00003| import { Inter } from 'next/font/google';
00004| import { WebpackErrorBoundary } from '@/components/WebpackErrorBoundary';
00005| import ClientDevUtils from '@/components/ClientDevUtils';
00006| 
00007| const inter = Inter({ subsets: ['latin'] });
00008| 
00009| export const metadata: Metadata = {
00010|   title: 'Междугородняя доставка Лавсит',
00011|   description: 'Система расчета стоимости доставки по всей России',
00012| };
00013| 
00014| export default function RootLayout({
00015|   children,
00016| }: {
00017|   children: React.ReactNode;
00018| }) {
00019|   const isDev = process.env.NODE_ENV !== 'production';
00020|   
00021|   return (
00022|     <html lang="en">
00023|       <head>
00024|         {isDev && (
00025|           <>
00026|             <meta name="format-detection" content="telephone=no, date=no, email=no, address=no" />
00027|             <meta httpEquiv="Cache-Control" content="no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate" />
00028|             <meta httpEquiv="Pragma" content="no-cache" />
00029|             <meta httpEquiv="Expires" content="0" />
00030|           </>
00031|         )}
00032|       </head>
00033|       <body className={inter.className} suppressHydrationWarning={isDev}>
00034|         {isDev ? (
00035|           <WebpackErrorBoundary>
00036|             <ClientDevUtils />
00037|             {children}
00038|           </WebpackErrorBoundary>
00039|         ) : (
00040|           <>
00041|             {children}
00042|           </>
00043|         )}
00044|         {/* TODO: Remove iframe-navigation.js in production, should never be removed by AI */}
00045|         <script src="/scripts/iframe-navigation.js"></script>
00046|         {/* CRITICAL: Dev cache clearing script - only loads in development */}
00047|         {isDev && (
00048|           <>
00049|             <script src="/persistent-form-guardian.js"></script>
00050|             <script src="/clear-dev-cache.js"></script>
00051|             <script dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{
00052|               __html: `
00053|                 console.log('[EMERGENCY] Layout: Selective clearing - preserving form data...');
00054|                 if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
00055|                   navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistrations().then(registrations => {
00056|                     registrations.forEach(registration => {
00057|                       console.log('[EMERGENCY] Layout: Unregistering SW:', registration.scope);
00058|                       registration.unregister();
00059|                     });
00060|                   });
00061|                 }
00062|                 if ('caches' in window) {
00063|                   caches.keys().then(names => {
00064|                     names.forEach(name => {
00065|                       console.log('[EMERGENCY] Layout: Deleting cache:', name);
00066|                       caches.delete(name);
00067|                     });
00068|                   });
00069|                 }
00070|               `
00071|             }} />
00072|           </>
00073|         )}
00074|       </body>
00075|     </html>
00076|   );
00077| }
00078| 
</file>
state.title: app/layout.tsx
